Title: Relates to COVID-19 pandemic medical debt requirements
Summary: Provides extensions for certain medical debt and insurance premiums related to the COVID-19 pandemic.
LawCode: Add §2828, Pub Health L; add Art 10-B §§286 - 287, D & C L; amd §5004, CPLR; add §§3244 & 4331, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the debtor and creditor law, the civil practice law and rules and the insurance law, in relation to COVID-19 pandemic medical debt requirements
